Reviews.Title: sweet TV, Samsung is the best
Reviews.Author: SeattleDog
Reviews.Content: How did I not have a smart TV before... geeze so cool. Way better then buying movies on demand, so many options to choose from for better pricing then Direct TV/ComcastPicture on the TV is legit.

Reviews.Title: It is OK but not as I expect.
Reviews.Author: CW
Reviews.Content: The TV is OK. However after watch two week, the screen showed no picture. It took about 9 days for Samsung to fix it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: pc
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research and finding a good price this TV met fully all my expectations.  The WiFi works great for streaming with no issues.

ProductInfo.Features:
Smart Content with Signature Services
Smart Hub
Built-in WiFi
Web Browser
Full HD 2D or 3D
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN46ES6600 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz 3D Slim LED HDTV (Black)
